content: --पातः {1} a look, glance; मार्गे मृगप्रेक्षिणि दृष्टिपातं कुरुष्व <ls>R. 13. 18</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 11</ls>, <ls n="Bh. 1.">94</ls>; <ls n="Bh.">3. 66.</ls> {2} act of seeing, function of the eye; रजःकणौर्विघ्नितदृष्टिपाताः <ls>Ku. 3. 31</ls> (<ls>Malli.</ls> interprets-unnecessarily in our opinion --पात by प्रभा).
